OOC: I think the main reason I didn't do Cybertron myself was because I did=
n't really want to move there, but I thought, hey, if it'll revive the RPG,=
 I'll listen to the people. Didn't work. Oh, well, there's always DBZSF to =
run...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Legendarynemasis@... 
 =
 To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, November 21, 2001 3:54 PM
 =
 Subject: Re: Debate (important everyone read)


  Well you see you dont co=
nstruct Cybertron to the way people want. If you give them what they want t=
hen they know what to expect. It isn't fun that way. If you use what we kno=
w from G1 and BW and make changes and stuff then thats okay becuase you sti=
ll leave room for unpredicted stuff. But I agree with KSL in saying the RPG=
s demise is coming close if the Monotomoy isnt broken soon. You can only fi=
ght in the same place with the same people for so long before its not fun a=
nymore. 
        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
         

       
       

  Your =
use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
